options.content:
This dashboard requires ONTAP 9.6+ and the REST collector. Two actions are required to use this dashboard:
1. Enable the REST collector in your harvest.yml config
2. Enable the EMS collector in your harvest.yml config for EMS events

targets.expr:
(count(health_disk_alerts{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",severity="error"}) or vector(0))
+
(count(health_shelf_alerts{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",severity="error"}) or vector(0))
+
(count(health_node_alerts{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",severity="error"}) or vector(0))
+
(count(health_network_fc_port_alerts{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",severity="error"}) or vector(0))
+
(count(health_network_ethernet_port_alerts{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",severity="error"}) or vector(0))
+
(count(health_license_alerts{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",severity="error"}) or vector(0))

(count(health_disk_alerts{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",severity="warning"}) or vector(0))
+
(count(health_shelf_alerts{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",severity="warning"}) or vector(0))
+
(count(last_over_time(health_support_alerts{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",severity="warning"}[24h]) == 1) or vector(0))
+
(count(health_network_interface_alerts{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",severity="warning"}) or vector(0))
+
(count(health_volume_move_alerts{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",severity="warning"}) or vector(0))
+
(count(health_volume_ransomware_alerts{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",severity="error"}) or vector(0))

targets.legendFormat: Network Interface are not at home port

panels.title: Network interfaces not at home port

panels.description: These are the health monitor events that have occurred within the selected time range
panels.title: System Alerts

current.text: The EMS collector gathers EMS events as defined in your ems.yml file. This panel displays events with emergency severity that occurred within the selected time range.
current.value: The EMS collector gathers EMS events as defined in your ems.yml file. This panel displays events with emergency severity that occurred within the selected time range.
